channel.title: Protocol design on Hong-Jie Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Protocol design on Hong-Jie Chen

item.title: Design of extended LTE protocol for fair coexistence between LTE-U and WiFi
item.description: Proposed a fairness criteria to determined fair coexistence between LTE and WiFi in unlicensed band. According to the criteria, designed an extended LTE-U protocol mainly based on MAC layer. Proved high performance of the design.
